column4: since i upgraded to Jaunty, i am having SLOW VIDEO (youtube, mplayer, everything...) When I watch the video at its normal size, it's faster. If I full-screen it, it's slow. I suspect that perhaps X is no longer using the 'xv' driver or using a poorly-chosen video driver. any ideas?
guessing, does mplayer -vo xv vid.avi exhibit that behavior? or does it whine that it can't use xv
xv seems to be working fine
